price: Аллах вам тако објашњава прописе Своје, да бисте размислили!
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum āyātihi laʿallakum taʿqilūna
